website_summaries.verdict: A lightweight yet durable barbell clamp collar that is made for a 2-inch Olympic bar.
pros: Lock-Jaw Hex features a unique design that allows you to securely clamp the collar in place without requiring much force, yet the holding power is impressive
The bright color makes the clamps easy to locate
cons: These clamps may slide when they are dropped from overhead

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money...these are garbage
customer_reviews.text: These were not anywhere near the quality of the last ones I bought. They slip on the bar and are made of a decidedly softer plastic material. Not worth what I paid for them.
customer_reviews.author: James Green

customer_reviews.title: Do not hold well
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I bought this is because I've seen them being sold on Eleiko website, and I hoped it to be a good product. I wanted light strong collars. These are light, but not strong. The collars don't hold anything at all. They are off after every rep, and I had to reset them after every set. I didn't last even one training session with them, and went back to OSO collars.
customer_reviews.author: Pavel

customer_reviews.title: Solid and durable
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these collars for my crossfit workouts, including deadlifts (over 300#), clean and jerks (135# dropped from the top), and back squats (225# dropped from the shoulders). They hold up great. They stay put, too, which I'm happy about. Even through Grace (30 C&Js for time), they held steady. I haven't had any trouble getting them on and off. I'm definitely satisfied with them, and I expect to be using them for a long time to come.
customer_reviews.author: J. White

customer_reviews.title: Not what Lock-Jaw used to be
customer_reviews.text: I picked these up because I have an older pair of Lock-Jaw collars that are still awesome. This newer design is much less substantial than the original pair. The plastic is considerably thinner and the latching mechanism is super light. These don't hold tight and loosen while even performing moderate lifts.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: As advertised great quality
customer_reviews.text: Plastic but good quality. Good for home gym if you dont wanna pay double for a rogue one. The rubberized collar insides really grab the bar nice. And unlatching them is not a pain like some other plastic ones. So far its an A+ awesome collar.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Kohl

customer_reviews.title: These are really not much better. One is sufficiently tight but the other is ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace other collars, which loosen during x-fit WODs. These are really not much better. One is sufficiently tight but the other is much looser and comes undone every time I do cleans. I guess that there are no good cheaper versions. I'll keep looking I guess.
customer_reviews.author: H. Wimberly

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical about these plastic things, but..
customer_reviews.text: So far I've purchased three sets. Call me crazy, but I find it better to have a set per bar that I have. They've been great with two different barbells and an ez curl bar. I know some have sent some of these things through the ringer. That's all fine to look at and watch on YouTube, however, it's not really practical for what will occur in my basement on a regular basis, if ever. Awesome product so far, does the job and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: The best clamps
customer_reviews.text: I own and use other brands of these. These are " BY FAR " the best ones out there. Theres not another clip to press like on others. Just one lever on this one. I have purposely loaded one side of the bar, put on 1 lock jaw, tipped the bar to try and make it slip and it just wont. These are worth the extra money. Especially if you work out at home alone like i do. I will be buying at least 2 more sets.
customer_reviews.author: T Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Such an amazing investment
customer_reviews.text: No more messing with the old school collars. Wasting precious GAINZ time. With these bad boys, you'll be up and ready to go in no time. Hitting those curls for the girls, presses to drop them dresses, tricep extensions for that sexual tension, lateral raises that gets them wet in the right places, and most of all rows for them dam good ho....
customer_reviews.author: Mr. McFly

customer_reviews.title: Great product, makes gym life easier.
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid of going with the lower brand versions of these and happy I bought the ones I did. So far after a little over a month of use they are still working fine. These are just hard plastic so I haven't been to rough on them (such as dropping things on them), but they do their job great. Has made loading and unloading the bar at the gym super easy and I don't have to waste time running around looking for the single pair of clamps in the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, Excellent Grip!
customer_reviews.text: These are incredibly strong and a great value. Coop at Garage Gym Reviews did a test with a bunch of Olympic collars, and these did very well in the test. I would recommend them to anyone looking for a simple, affordable and very tight-fitting barbell collar.
customer_reviews.author: Zenzo Tazawa

customer_reviews.title: Work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: These collars are great! Light weight, lock down securely and are easily put on and removed. I'm using a set on a curl bar and have no issues with them slipping around. At $15.99 a set it's worth the buy. I'm definitely buying more when I get the rest of my home gym put together!!! A+++ product.
customer_reviews.author: Mark S.Top Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Great easy to use collars.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Easy to use and creates a solid lock. I've been using these for a couple of months and I'm very pleased. I also bought 2 pair of the cheaper models and my opinion is that these are by far the best. I use the cheaper ones on bars at home that I seldom change the weight on. I take these to the gym because they are very easy/quick to put on and remove. I've not used them with weight above 200 lbs so can't attest to how they will stand up to very heavy weights.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lock Jaw Olympic 2”
customer_reviews.text: I’m super happy with this clamp. It work excellent, super easy and fast to use and feel really solid. Only 1 issue (which is not the clamp) is if your Olympic bar is slight smaller then true 2”. Then what I do (for my TDS Deltoid machine) is I slide a cardboard inside to use it. Easy fix
customer_reviews.author: Thy N

customer_reviews.title: BUY THESE
customer_reviews.text: I bought these like maybe a year or so ago and they are holding up fine. Even if they fell apart tomorrow I would buy the exact same pair. These things are so so so easy to slide on and lock with one hand. More importantly when you lock the clamp down it LOCKS the plates in place. The plates do not slide around whatsoever. STOP FIGHTING WITH THOSE CHEAP CRAPPY METAL ONES ALL GYMS HAVE. Out of all the gym equipment I own these would be the first thing I would buy if I had to start all over again. HIghly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Dills

customer_reviews.title: Awesome clamps
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because I saw good reviews and glad I did. They are easy to slip on and off and they are strong. I have "tested" them or anything weird but they are tight when you clamp them down. I lift without any worries.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Not good for Olympic lifting
customer_reviews.text: I've had these collars for about 9 months and they are good for bench pressing and/or curling. If you are going to be doing any Olympic lifting where you are dropping the bar w/ plates down, the collars unhinge themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Brown

customer_reviews.title: Just ok because failure
customer_reviews.text: Overall kind of loose. One of the collars stop gripping and the weights slipped off. Could have been a serious thing if i were doing any other exercises. Decent price, but worth buying something else...
customer_reviews.author: H.Stone

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy no slip clamp
customer_reviews.text: it is the quickest and easiest clamp to use. feels solid and holds on the bar tight. I rated the durability as 5 star for what I use it for; deadlifts, squats and bench press. I don't overload the bar or drop it .
customer_reviews.author: Marquezj16

customer_reviews.title: Works great, fast plate changes
customer_reviews.text: I use these on my deadlift bar. I was using spring collars and hated them. These collars do exactly what I hoped. They only come off when I take them off and they are quick and easy to take off and on. I don't remove them often (once every few days), so I don't know if the locking mechanism wears out. I would recommend them based on my experience so far.
customer_reviews.author: J. Plunk

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, inferior design. Broke first use, and it wouldn't hold weights in place anyway.
customer_reviews.text: Broke after the first clamp attempt and wouldn't close. Returned. Don't waste your time. Go for this instead:  Much sturdier, actually grips the bar, and is resistant to plate motion. Used them on both barbells and dumbbells. Couldn't recommend them highly enough.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly easy to latch and unlatch...
customer_reviews.text: ...and they hold very well. Happy with this purchase and recommend them for routine exercise use. Have not dropped loaded barbell with these so Oly/Xfit weightlifters, you're on your own. I use Lock-Jaw Pro clamps (available here on Amazon) for dynamic lifts.
customer_reviews.author: o1d_dude

customer_reviews.title: Excellent collars
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality material. Sturdy enough to keep heavy weights on the weight bar. You don't have to pay a arm and leg for weight bar collars, these are same quality!
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm Smith

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how well these collars work with powerlifting or CrossFit where weights are thrown down with vigor😱. Using them on a Powertec or Bodysolid corner leverage gym designed for Olympic weights, is a time expedient exercise in safety and great design.
customer_reviews.author: Wilbur

customer_reviews.title: Holding up great, working like new a few months in.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for all my lifts.. keeps very tight even for deadlifts.. the lockjaw oly 2 collars are slightly grippier and the best but these are great and a great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: been using these for about 8 months several times a week. I am not a power lifter so went with this model. does what is supposed to do and is holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: paul baeckel

customer_reviews.title: 3, 2, 1 Lift Off!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, at first, I was a skeptic. However, after several uses these collars held up. Even if I dropped my weights, depending on how much you have on there; they might nudge a bit but nothing significant or noticeable. They came well packaged and soft to the touch was the first thing I noticed.
customer_reviews.author: Bao H.

customer_reviews.title: Started strong. Lost its mojo.
customer_reviews.text: Bought them 3 months ago for home gym. During dumbbell press one of the clamps slid right off. Dumped weight on my head. So replace after 3 months maybe. Worked great for first few months.
customer_reviews.author: bishop1080

customer_reviews.title: I love these compared the the others I have
customer_reviews.text: These ones are my favorite. Here is why, my standard black ones are slightly loose and I need both hands to open and close them. These are snug and I can open and close the clamp with one hand. I would like to own a few more sets!
customer_reviews.author: Fit Hot MEss

customer_reviews.title: Fast collars
customer_reviews.text: I wanted collars that were quick and these work perfectly. I use these everyday and they show no signs of wear. I do not drop my bar though.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: Dog tested
customer_reviews.text: My 60 pound pit got the package before I did and did a number on these. They still work just fine. Also they come in packs of 2 not 1 like I thought. I might just be stupid though.
customer_reviews.author: Big boy

customer_reviews.title: Been Taking a Beating for Months and Still Holds Tight
customer_reviews.text: I do pretty intense workouts that involve repeatedly dropping the barbell on the ground. After 9 months they still stay clipped and hold the weights snug on the bar. Best collars I ever bought for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Brett L.

customer_reviews.title: Great grip
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Very quick and easy to use. Great grip and great quality for the price. I use these everyday and they work like new everytime
customer_reviews.author: Millicent

customer_reviews.title: I don't know how anyone can use spring clamps with these around
customer_reviews.text: Great and very easy to use. Its nice and thick material. I don't know how I dealt with spring clamps before. Should have bought these a lot sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Cashsky

customer_reviews.title: Love them.  Super Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Best collars I've found yet. Seem very sturdy. Easy to use with one hand. Don't appear to loosen, at least with the weights I'm using < 350 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Bigreader

customer_reviews.title: The wife and I are pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two pairs and I like them so far. They are not as nice as the 60$ rouge, but they seem to hold on the bar well even when droped multiple times. I'd say for the money it's pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: James C Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Awesome collars to add to your 2'' bar.
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of the spring clamps I have, couldn't roll the bar on the ground. Now I can. I put these type on all my curl bars and straight bars.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: I love them and will never go back to spring collars. Very strong and out of the way when lifting with my olympic dumbells. I recommend, 5 stars for sure
customer_reviews.author: Big Deak

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Far more solid and secure than they first appear. I've been using them every day for six months now and they're definitely good to go. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! I no longer dread switching out plates!
customer_reviews.text: These are phenomenal. Easy to use, lovely bright color, and just all around do what they are intended to do. Would buy again 100%!
customer_reviews.author: ladyluck

customer_reviews.title: ... using them for several weeks now and they work great and have held up just fine
customer_reviews.text: I've been using them for several weeks now and they work great and have held up just fine. I've squatted and deadlifted with them using up to 240#s, so far without issue. They are easier to work with than olympic clips and do not get in the way when setting smaller plates on the bar which is on the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Tweezer

customer_reviews.title: Exact measurement are very important.
customer_reviews.text: This item did not fit on smooth surfaces. So I applied grip tape so it would stick better on the bar.and now works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Arroyo

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly, nice collar
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. So far so perfect. I've only used it for one session but so far it's perfect and way better than what I was using before. I'd recommend these. They feel sturdy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Hamza

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Really like these barbell locks. Saw them on YouTube and decided to take a chance. Definitely worked as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Ahave E. Brown Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great collars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bar collars. I've bought some before and decided to buy again only because I left my old ones at the gym. Perfect for dead lifts and cleans. Keeps weights from moving away from bat.
customer_reviews.author: RAYDEN

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Loved them and ordered two more. Daughter says better than ones at the gym. No slip and best collars ive ever used
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to put on and take off.
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to Olympic lifting and wasn't sure about these vs clips. I tried both and prefer these.
customer_reviews.author: George Lutz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Arrived fast! Have been using it for over 2 weeks and so far no problems. Use them for squads, curling bar. I definitely would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben V Juarez

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and seem to be holding up well. Easier to get on and off than the spring clips. Glad I spent a bit more for the Lock-Jaw HEX over the cheaper versions. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: After a month, these locks no longer locked tightly in place. They slid away during deadlifts. I threw them away in the recycling bin. I now wrap wrist straps around the bar to keep the plates from moving.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value. Solid collars
customer_reviews.text: Needed a low cost collar solution for start up gym. Much easier to take on and off than spring collars. Also gives the gym a more professional look than spring collars. Seem to be holding up well. They grip well on regular Olympic bars and trap bars.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Powell

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: I honestly love these so much I'm thinking about ordering another pair for home.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie J. Huff

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Product works well. I’ve used better ones but this one is comparable and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: MaoX

customer_reviews.title: Lock-jaw Olympic barbell quick release clamps
customer_reviews.text: For the price point these quick release collars are an excellent choice.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Had to buy once the once stocked in my gym came up missing. Easy to use, fits the bars, and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Lakia Renee

customer_reviews.title: Great value and solid performance
customer_reviews.text: Really a great deal for very nice clips. Holds well against dropping of barbell and weights during Olympic lifting.
customer_reviews.author: auseafan

customer_reviews.title: Sizing
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like that I wasn't able to differentiate between regulation and standard sizes. This was too big for my Joe Weider weight set. As a result, they are no more good to me than a paperweight.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Abney

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Great set. Seams to be working still . They do get used a lot .
customer_reviews.author: Kelp eater

customer_reviews.title: They're Orange!
customer_reviews.text: These look great! When my wife brings her friends over I add extra 45lb plates to the bar as they have to walk around it to come in through the garage.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These are great, my son struggles with the spring clamps, these are so easy in comparison.
customer_reviews.author: Tuvix

customer_reviews.title: Best Olympic barbell collars
customer_reviews.text: My favorite collars by far. Lightweight with a strong clamp thanks to the full silicone strip inside.
customer_reviews.author: PeteDC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome!! Click on so easily, fit well and hold my weights in place.
customer_reviews.author: Aegrosso

customer_reviews.title: Very strong!
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for about a month and have put in through the test of holding the weights while dropping the bar many times and it has held up quite nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Harry Ferrer

customer_reviews.title: Pink bar clamps
customer_reviews.text: I like them and they hold up well I don’t have to wait on someone to use the gyms’s bar bell clamp. I ordered them in pink and my husband uses them too
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Already defective
customer_reviews.text: I'v e had my lock jaw hex for less than a month and already one of them is defective and will not hold when the bar is set down or dropped. I really like the ease of use with these. Maybe just got a defective pair as I ordered a set at the same time as another friend did and hi still work fine.
customer_reviews.author: JD Logelinl

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for over 2 years and no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Good product !
customer_reviews.text: Product feels like a good quality material, they fit bar really well! Great product and great price
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Fits my bar perfectly, stays in place as advertised. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Super easy
customer_reviews.text: Very fast to change out and not get pinched like clips. Love these things. Ordered a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Pirate Penguin

customer_reviews.title: They just don’t work.
customer_reviews.text: These are priced right but they don’t hold at all. Usually these things wear out with age and will not hold anymore but these won’t hold right out of the package. I expected more.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Gibson

customer_reviews.title: GAME.CHANGER.
customer_reviews.text: I love these collars! Easy to grip, place on the bar & unhook. LOVE!! I would totally recommend these to anyone and everyone who works out with barbells
customer_reviews.author: Felisha Trevino

customer_reviews.title: Super smooth, easy open and close
customer_reviews.text: I actually chose these because I liked the color options! I was pleasantly surprised at the stellar quality when I received them. They are larger than I expected also. Opening and locking functions are effortless. Really nice product!
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTINA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lifting clamps
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. Good grip on the bar but not too hard to close
customer_reviews.author: Thandels

customer_reviews.title: These are great barbell collars
customer_reviews.text: These are great barbell collars. I've tried a ton of different ones (including other Lock-Jaw Collars), and these are my favorite. Quick on, quick off. Very light and clamp very firmly to bar. Haven't had any plates move yet. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Olson

customer_reviews.title: Best collars!
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Actually prefer them to the traditional design ... they hold the weights solidly. Easy one-hand operation to put on or take off.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Wagoner

customer_reviews.title: These are my favorite locking collars
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite locking collars, and I've tried several brands. They don't look like they'd stay locked when you drop a heavy barbell because they don't have a separate locking tab like on most types, but they grip like a junkyard dog's jaws. I LOVE THEM!!!
customer_reviews.author: D.P. Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but strong.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these due to a shortage at my gym and have no regrets. My first concern was the price and that they may be cheaply made but found just the opposite to be true. They are well constructed and hold up to the high weight ranges on drop exercises.
customer_reviews.author: kelton henderson

customer_reviews.title: Cute & durable
customer_reviews.text: You have to keep the clamps fully open when sliding then onto the barbell, otherwise you'll have a hard time. Aside from that, these are great!
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent collars. Works as they should keeping the plates ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent collars. Works as they should keeping the plates in place. Works better than the worn out commercial gym collars. Best part no more walking around the gym looking for collars.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Okay but not great
customer_reviews.text: These work fine but they're not nearly as high of quality as others I've bought for similar prices. I'm not sure how long they'll last but they work for now.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: I will purchase again! The product did exactly as it claimed. It held the plates in place, easy to slide in and lock for good. Just do your workout!
customer_reviews.author: JING

customer_reviews.title: Amazing but don't drop a weight on it. I broke mine
customer_reviews.text: Great locks, did the job and they are so simple to remove. Ordered a second pair because the I broke 1 by accidentally dropping a weight on it.
customer_reviews.author: Chunky

customer_reviews.title: Purples the best color
customer_reviews.text: These are one of the best investments I've made to my gym bag. I hate looking for and sharing the collars at the gym. Saves energy for big lifts. Easy to remove and place on.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac C.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: It slides off the bar and doesnt stay lock where you place it.
customer_reviews.author: Nal

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: These seem to keep the weights in place very well and are easy to lock on and remove. I've had over 400lbs on doing deadlifts and they stayed in place
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal for beginners-intermediate.  Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Bought my first pair to try them out and put them through some exercises I thought for sure would get them to fail but they held. Made my routine so much smoother than the old spring clamps so I bought two more sets.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Lambert

customer_reviews.title: These things are awesome!. I've dropped the barbell from over with ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used these for a few months now for Crossfit. These things are awesome!. I've dropped the barbell from over with weights from 95# up to 225# and the weights have not moved. If you don't want to spend and arm and a leg on other collars I'd buy these in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: dave szegda

customer_reviews.title: Nice but only one works
customer_reviews.text: Well out of the set one works nice and tight the other barely clamps.
customer_reviews.author: Payson McCune

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for Olympic dumbbells
customer_reviews.text: These collars are NOT secure!!! I tried using them with my olympic dumbbells and the weights slipped about a quarter of an inch on each dumbbell. This is not reassuring especially when doing overhead lifts! Will not recommend or purchasw again!
customer_reviews.author: Michael B.

customer_reviews.title: better than lockjaw pro
customer_reviews.text: these are awesome. i actually like these better than my lockjaw pro. did 405 deadlift and they didnt budge. love them
customer_reviews.author: Allen payne

customer_reviews.title: Work Great
customer_reviews.text: They work great! Clamp tight with no slip, and they release easily.
customer_reviews.author: Gunther

customer_reviews.title: Best clip for the price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent clips. Hold weights like a champ, whether it’s heavy or repeated reps. Wish they were a hair thinner, but awesome for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Herford

customer_reviews.title: Keeps weights secured, gives you an anabolic advantage
customer_reviews.text: This is a reasonably priced item, functions well & will give you the anabolic advantage you seek without the use of steroids. The advanced state-of-the-art polymers begin to stimulate muscle growth the moment you lock them in place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Collars!
customer_reviews.text: We have been using these collars for about 1 month now, so far so good. Very easy to use, and makes switching weights a quick process. Hoping they hold up as the plastic construction seems questionable. As of right now I am completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: SHinIA

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect. I dead 425 with these and the plates don't slip. I don't bang or drop the weights around like a sissy cross fitter tho.
customer_reviews.author: OG BIG PANDA

customer_reviews.title: Awesome clips
customer_reviews.text: Love my clips!!! They are great!!! Easy on and off and stays in place. Great product and I will get them again. People at the gym who use my clips love them too. I've used them many many times and they still are great!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Del Valle

customer_reviews.title: the Lock Jaw is substantially better quality! Just wish they had all of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought a knock off brand to save a few $$$, but came broke! Holding the two hand in hand...the Lock Jaw is substantially better quality! Just wish they had all of the cool colors like the off brands do!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew E. Moon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: these are perfect! quick to put on and take off and rock solid when clamped down.
customer_reviews.author: Heyitsryan

customer_reviews.title: Best collars in the box.
customer_reviews.text: Only used for a little over a month now but even after regular sanitation they have held up and haven't popped even on a heavy bar.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Carr

customer_reviews.title: Great clamps
customer_reviews.text: Great clamps. I finally got to use them after 3 months of waiting. Easy to use and they lock on right.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Donnelly

product_meta.title: Lock-Jaw HEX 50mm / 2" Olympic Barbell Collar - Quick Release Barbell Clamp
feature_bullets: Extremely durable and light barbell collar.
For home, commercial gyms, high schools and universities.
